law.catch_line: In a derivative action, the plaintiff must be a partner at the time of bringing the action and:...
law.text:
In a derivative action, the plaintiff must be a partner at the time of bringing the action and:
Have been a partner at the time of the transaction of which he complains; or
Have had his status as a partner devolve on him by operation of law from a person who was a partner at the time of the transaction.
